Posts.EditableText: I'm new to Quest, and have noticed that in some games there is an object (e.g. a ship, or a car) that is a "place"--you click "go here" and enter the object.  How is that done?  I am assuming it is still an object, not a room? is it a special type?  Is there a standard way to do this that I am missing?  thanks!
Posts.HTML: I'm new to Quest, and have noticed that in some games there is an object (e.g. a ship, or a car) that is a "place"--you click "go here" and enter the object.  How is that done?  I am assuming it is still an object, not a room? is it a special type?  Is there a standard way to do this that I am missing?  thanks!

Posts.EditableText:
It looks like an object but it's not. Those are go to exits you can make from the exit screen.
Wonderjudge.
Posts.HTML:
It looks like an object but it's not. Those are go to exits you can make from the exit screen.
